DIY的 ajax 框架

Feb 11, 2015

 front-end  ajax  javascript

话不多说，直接上源码，用了传说中的伪面向对象写法

加了个jsonp用来跨域，当然了，需要服务端支持才有效

  1(function(){
  2    var WT = {
  3
  4        ID_SEL:'# ',
  5
  6        CLA_SEL:'.',
  7
  8        newInstance:function(){
  9
 10            var instance = {};
 11
 12            var setAttrs = function (dom,attrs){
 13                for(var key in attrs){
 14                    dom.setAttribute(key,attrs[key]);
 15                }
 16            }
 17
 18            var convertParam = function(data){
 19                var param = [];
 20                for (var key in data) {
 21                    param.push(encodeURIComponent(key) + '=' + encodeURIComponent(data[key]));
 22                }
 23                return param;
 24            }
 25
 26            instance.select = function(selector){
 27                var h = selector.charAt(0);
 28                var o = null;
 29                var m = null;
 30                if(h==WT.ID_SEL){
 31                    m = selector.substr(1);
 32                    o = document.getElementById(m);
 33                }
 34                else if(h==WT.CLA_SEL){
 35                    //TODO
 36                    //m = selector.substr(1);
 37                    //o = document.getElementsByClassName(m);
 38                }else {
 39                    m = selector;
 40                    o = document.getElementsByTagName(m);
 41                }
 42                return o;
 43            }
 44
 45            instance.load = function(tagName, attrs, callback){
 46                var dom = document.createElement(tagName);
 47                setAttrs(dom,attrs);
 48                dom.onload=function(){
 49                    typeof callback === 'function' && callback.call(this,dom);
 50                    dom = null; callback =null;
 51                }
 52                return dom;
 53            }
 54
 55
 56            instance.jsonp = function(jp){
 57                //---- attributes----//
 58                var callback = jp.callback;
 59                var url = jp.url;
 60                var data = jp.data;
 61
 62                var cn = 'jsonp'+ Date.now();
 63                window[cn] = callback;
 64                var param = convertParam(data);
 65                param.push('callback=' + cn);
 66                url += (url.indexOf('?')==-1 ? '?' : '') + param.join('&');
 67
 68                var script = document.createElement('script');
 69                script.type = 'text/javascript';
 70                script.onload = script.onreadystatechange = function() {
 71                    this.parentNode.removeChild(script);
 72                    delete window[cn];
 73                    script.onload = script.onreadystatechange = null;
 74                }
 75                script.src = url;
 76                this.select('body')[0].appendChild(script);
 77            }
 78
 79            instance.ajax = function(jp){
 80                //---- attributes----//
 81                var type = jp.type;type ? type : 'GET';
 82                var url = jp.url;
 83                var data = jp.data;
 84                var success = jp.success;
 85
 86                var xhr = XMLHttpRequest ? new XMLHttpRequest() : new ActiveXObject("Microsoft.XMLHTTP");
 87                xhr.open(type,url);
 88                if (type.toUpperCase() === 'POST') {
 89                    xhr.setRequestHeader('Content-Type', 'application/x-www-form-urlencoded');
 90                }
 91                xhr.onreadystatechange = function(){
 92                    if(xhr.readyState==4){
 93                        typeof success === 'function' && success(eval('(' + xhr.responseText + ')'), xhr.status);
 94                        xhr = null;
 95                    }
 96                }
 97                xhr.send(convertParam(data).join('&'));
 98            }
 99
100            instance.loadImg = function (url, callback) {
101                /** img的onload在图片下载完成后,dom加载前发生 **/
102                this.load('img',{src:url},callback);
103            }
104
105            instance.loadCss = function(url,callback){
106                /** css的onload 在 dom加载后发生 **/
107                var dom = this.load('link',{rel:'stylesheet',type:'text/css',href:url},callback);
108                this.select('head')[0].appendChild(dom);
109            }
110
111            instance.loadJs = function(url,callback){
112                /** js的onload 在 dom加载后发生 **/
113                var js = this.load('script',{type:'text/javascript',src:url},callback);
114                this.select('body')[0].appendChild(js);
115            }
116
117            return instance;
118        }
119    };
120    window['$'] = WT.newInstance();
121})();
 Toc
